original: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya gsum pa /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bam po brgya gsum pa / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: Volume 103🔽They do not conceptually differentiate 'the perfection of generosity is empty,'

original: stong pa nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽stong pa nyid tshul khrims @2a #//
analyzed: stong pa nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid tshul khrims @2a #//
translated: and they do not conceptually differentiate 'emptiness is the perfection of generosity.'🔽They do not conceptually differentiate 'the perfection of moral discipline is empty,'

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽stong pa nyid bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they do not conceptually differentiate 'emptiness is the perfection of moral discipline.'🔽They do not conceptually differentiate 'the perfection of patience is empty,'🔽and they do not conceptually differentiate 'emptiness is the perfection of patience.'

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate 'the perfection of perseverance is empty,'🔽and they do not conceptually differentiate 'emptiness is the perfection of perseverance.'

original: stong pa nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is emptiness.🔽They will not conceptualize that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar @2b rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar @2b rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.🔽They will not conceptualize that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not conceptualize that the transcendent perfection of generosity is signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that the signless is the transcendent perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceive of the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceive of the absence of signs as the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They will not conceive of the transcendent perfection of tolerance as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya @3a #//🔽bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽mtshan ma med pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya @3a #// bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / mtshan ma med pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceive of the absence of signs as the transcendent perfection of tolerance.🔽They will not conceive of the transcendent perfection of perseverance as having signs.🔽They will not conceive of the absence of signs as the transcendent perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceive of the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration as being signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the transcendent perfection of wisdom as being signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize signlessness as being the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽They will not conceptualize the transcendent perfection of generosity as being aspirationless.

original: smon pa med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize aspirationlessness as being the transcendent perfection of generosity.🔽They will not conceptualize the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as being aspirationless.

original: smon pa med pa @3b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa @3b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize aspirationlessness as being the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: smon pa med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize wishlessness as the perfection of patience.🔽They should not conceptualize the perfection of perseverance as wishless.

original: smon pa med pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize wishlessness as the perfection of perseverance.🔽They should not conceptualize the perfection of concentration as wishless.

analyzed: smon pa med pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: skye ba med pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

analyzed: dben pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize voidness as the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.🔽They should not conceptualize the transcendent perfection of wisdom as void.

original: dben pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par @5b rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rnam par @5b rtog par mi 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize voidness as the transcendent perfection of wisdom.🔽They should not conceptualize the emptiness of internal phenomena as empty.

original: stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽They should not conceptualize the emptiness of external phenomena as empty.

original: stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They should not conceptualize emptiness as the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They should not conceptualize the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena as empty.

original: stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually construct ‘outer emptiness’ as emptiness.🔽They do not conceptually construct ‘inner and outer emptiness’ as emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually construct ‘inner and outer emptiness’ as emptiness.🔽They do not conceptually construct ‘great emptiness’ as emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually construct ‘great emptiness’ as emptiness.🔽They do not conceptually construct ‘ultimate emptiness’ as emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually construct ‘ultimate emptiness’ as emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually construct ‘conditioned emptiness’ as emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate emptiness as the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽They do not conceptually differentiate the emptiness of the unconditioned as empty.

original: stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par @6a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par @6a *//
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate emptiness as the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They do not conceptually differentiate the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as empty.

original: mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate emptiness as the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded as empty.🔽They do not conceptually differentiate emptiness as the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate the emptiness of inherent existence as empty.

original: stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the unlimited’ as the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of inherent existence’ as the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of inherent existence’ as the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all phenomena’ as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all phenomena’ as the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of defining characteristics’ as the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of defining characteristics’ as the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension’ as the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension is emptiness. ’🔽They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of things is empty. ’

original: stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam @6b par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam @6b par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of things is emptiness. ’🔽They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is empty. ’

original: stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is emptiness. ’🔽They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all things is empty. ’

original: stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all things is emptiness. ’

original: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension is signless. ’

original: mtshan ma med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of internal phenomena as a sign.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of external phenomena as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of external and internal phenomena as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of great extent as signless.

original: mtshan ma med chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of great signlessness as a great signlessness.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of the ultimate as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog @7a *//🔽par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog @7a *// par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of beyond extremes as signless.

original: mtshan ma med pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of the unlimited as having signs.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-dispersal as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of non-dispersal as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the emptiness of inherent existence as having signs.

original: mtshan ma med pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize the emptiness of inherent existence as signless.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the emptiness of all phenomena’ as a signless,

original: mtshan ma med pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya @7b bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya @7b bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: and they do not conceptually differentiate ‘signlessness’ as ‘the emptiness of all phenomena.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the emptiness of defining characteristics’ as a signless,

original: mtshan ma med pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they do not conceptually differentiate ‘signlessness’ as ‘the emptiness of defining characteristics.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension’ as a signless,🔽and they do not conceptually differentiate ‘signlessness’ as ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension.’

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the emptiness of non-entities’ as a signless,🔽and they do not conceptually differentiate ‘signlessness’ as ‘the emptiness of non-entities.’

original: mtshan ma med pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize the emptiness of the nonexistence of things as a sign;🔽they will not conceptualize the emptiness of inherent existence as signless;

original: mtshan ma med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness of inherent existence; they will not conceptualize the emptiness that is the essential nature of nonexistence as signless;

original: mtshan ma med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize signlessness as the emptiness that is the essential nature of nonexistence.🔽“They will not conceptualize the emptiness of internal phenomena as wishless;

original: smon pa med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of internal phenomena;

original: phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize the emptiness of external phenomena as wishless;

original: smon pa med pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of the external as the wishless.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam @8a *//🔽par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam @8a *// par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of the internal and the external as the wishless.

original: smon pa med pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the wishless as the emptiness of the internal and the external.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of emptiness as the wishless.

original: smon pa med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the wishless as the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of great extent as the wishless.

original: smon pa med pa chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize the wishless as the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of ultimate reality as the wishless.

original: smon pa med pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur //
analyzed: smon pa med pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur //
translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness of ultimate reality as wishless.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as wishless.

original: smon pa med pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as wishless.

original: smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽smon pa med pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / smon pa med pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness of beyond extremes as wishless.🔽They do not conceptualize wishlessness as the emptiness of beyond extremes.

original: 'gag pa med pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: ’ They do not conceptually construct ‘the unannihilated is the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽’ They do not conceptually construct ‘the emptiness of non-things is unannihilated.

original: 'gag pa med pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: ’ They do not conceptually construct ‘the unannihilated is the emptiness of non-things.🔽’ They do not conceptually construct ‘the emptiness of essential nature is unannihilated.

original: 'gag pa med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: ’ They do not conceptually construct ‘the unannihilated is the emptiness of essential nature.🔽’

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that the emptiness of essential nature with regard to non-entities is cessation.

original: 'gag pa med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @11b stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @11b stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not entertain the idea that cessation is the emptiness of essential nature with regard to non-entities.

original: nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that inner emptiness is calm.🔽They will not entertain the idea that calm is inner emptiness.

original: zhi ba nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that outer emptiness is calm.

original: zhi ba phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that calm is outer emptiness.🔽They will not entertain the idea that inner and outer emptiness is calm.

original: zhi ba phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not entertain the idea that calm is inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not entertain the idea that the emptiness of emptiness is calm.

original: zhi ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the unlimited’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: zhi ba chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽zhi ba don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / zhi ba don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of inherent existence’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all things’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of all things.

original: zhi ba 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all things’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of all things.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the essential nature’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of the essential nature.

original: zhi ba 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension’ as empty, and they do not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽zhi ba mtha' @12a *//
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / zhi ba mtha' @12a *//
translated: They will not conceive of the emptiness of what transcends limits as calm,

original: las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor will they conceive of calm as the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of no beginning and no end as calm,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur; zhi ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur; zhi ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: nor will they conceive of calm as the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of non-apprehension as calm,

original: zhi ba dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: nor will they conceive of calm as the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽They will not conceive of the emptiness of inherent existence as calm,

original: zhi ba rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nor will they conceive of calm as the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually divide the emptiness of all phenomena as peaceful or not peaceful.

original: zhi ba chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually divide peace as the emptiness of all phenomena or not the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽They do not conceptually divide the emptiness of defining characteristics as peaceful or not peaceful.

original: zhi ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually divide peace as the emptiness of defining characteristics or not the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They do not conceptually divide the emptiness of non-apprehension as peaceful or not peaceful.

original: zhi ba mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhi ba mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually divide peace as the emptiness of non-apprehension or not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽zhi ba dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / zhi ba dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually divide the emptiness of non-entities as peaceful or not peaceful.🔽They do not conceptually divide peace as the emptiness of non-entities or not the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually divide the emptiness of essential nature as peaceful or not peaceful.

original: @12b zhi ba ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: @12b zhi ba ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize that the emptiness of essential nature is peace,🔽they will not conceptualize that the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is peace,

original: zhi ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize that peace is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,🔽they will not conceptualize that inner emptiness is void,

original: dben pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize that voidness is inner emptiness,🔽they will not conceptualize that outer emptiness is void,

original: dben pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize that voidness is outer emptiness,🔽they will not conceptualize that inner and outer emptiness is void,

original: dben pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not conceptualize that voidness is inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of the emptiness of emptiness as isolated.

original: dben pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of isolation as the emptiness of emptiness.🔽They do not conceive of the emptiness of the great as isolated.

original: dben pa chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of isolation as the emptiness of the great.🔽They do not conceive of the emptiness of the ultimate as isolated.

original: dben pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of isolation as the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They do not conceive of the emptiness of the conditioned as isolated.

original: dben pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong @13a *//
analyzed: dben pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas stong @13a *//
translated: They do not conceive of isolation as the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽They do not conceive of the emptiness of the unconditioned as isolated.

original: pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceive of isolation as the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: dben pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of the conditioned is void.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽dben pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / dben pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of the unconditioned is void.🔽They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of the conditioned is not void.🔽They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of the unconditioned is not void.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is void.🔽They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not void.

original: dben pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is essentially beginningless and endless is void.🔽They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is essentially beginningless and endless is not void.🔽They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is void.

original: dben pa dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not void.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptualize that the emptiness of nature is void.

original: dben pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of inherent existence is void’;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of all phenomena is void’;

original: dben pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘voidness is the emptiness of all phenomena’;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of defining characteristics is void’;

original: dben pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi @13b 'gyur /🔽dben pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi @13b 'gyur / dben pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘voidness is the emptiness of defining characteristics’;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of nonapprehension is void’;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘voidness is the emptiness of nonapprehension’;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of nonthings is void’;

original: dben pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the nonexistence of things’ as isolated;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of own-marks’ as isolated;

original: dben pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘isolation’ as the emptiness of own-marks;🔽they will not conceptualize ‘the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being’ as isolated;

original: dben pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘isolation’ as the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being.🔽They will not conceptualize ‘the applications of mindfulness’ as empty;

original: stong pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘emptiness’ as the applications of mindfulness;

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: they will not conceptualize ‘the applications of mindfulness’ as signless;

original: mtshan ma med pa dran pa nya bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dran pa nya bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the applications of mindfulness are signless.’

original: smon pa med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /🔽skye ba med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam @14a *//
analyzed: smon pa med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur / skye ba med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam @14a *//
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the applications of mindfulness are wishless.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘wishlessness is the applications of mindfulness.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the applications of mindfulness are not produced.’

original: par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘nonproduction is the applications of mindfulness.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the applications of mindfulness are unceasing.’

original: 'gag pa med pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘uncessation is the applications of mindfulness.’

translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation as “wishless.”

translated: They do not conceptualize the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation as “non-arising.”🔽They do not conceptualize the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation as “cessation.”

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘calm is the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation are void.’

translated: They do not conceive of nonarising as the superknowledges.🔽They do not conceive of the superknowledges as unceasing.

translated: They do not conceptually identify voidness as the superknowledges.🔽They do not conceptually identify the superknowledges as signless.🔽They do not conceptually identify signlessness as the superknowledges.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /

original: 'gag pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘cessation is the conditioned element.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the conditioned element is calm.’

original: zhi ba 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘calmness is the conditioned element.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the conditioned element is void.’

original: dben pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dben pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘voidness is the conditioned element.’🔽They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the unconditioned element is empty.’

original: stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘emptiness is the unconditioned element.’

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They do not conceptually differentiate ‘the unconditioned element is signless.’

original: mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as signless.🔽They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as wishless.

original: smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize wishlessness as the unconditioned element.🔽They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as non-arising.

original: skye ba med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dus ma byas kyi khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: skye ba med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro // 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize non-arising as the unconditioned element.🔽They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as unceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur @29a *//
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur @29a *//
translated: They will not conceptualize unceasingness as the unconditioned element.

original: ro; ;'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ro; ;'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as peaceful.

original: zhi ba 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhi ba 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro; ;'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as peace.

original: dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize the unconditioned element as being void.

original: lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Divine princes, for that reason

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is so profound,

original: de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba /🔽de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba'i spyod yul /
analyzed: de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba / de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba'i spyod yul /
translated: so difficult to fathom,🔽so difficult to see,

original: de ltar phra ba /
analyzed: de ltar phra ba /
translated: so subtle,

original: de ltar gsal pa /
analyzed: de ltar gsal pa /
translated: so clear,

original: de ltar blta dka' ba /
analyzed: de ltar blta dka' ba /
translated: so difficult to see,

original: de ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: so difficult to understand,

original: de ltar zhi ba /🔽de ltar bzang ba /
analyzed: de ltar zhi ba / de ltar bzang ba /
translated: so peaceful,🔽so excellent,

original: de ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: de ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: so sublime,

original: de ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba /
analyzed: de ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba /
translated: so to be known by the wise and the learned,

original: de la yid ches par byed pa su'ang med de /
analyzed: de la yid ches par byed pa su'ang med de /
translated: and so hard to have confidence in.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad do //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad do //
translated: Because in it no dharma has been taught or explained.

original: ji ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad pa de bzhin du; 'di la sems can gang yang yid ches par byed pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad pa de bzhin du; 'di la sems can gang yang yid ches par byed pa med do //
translated: Just as no dharma is taught or explained here, so no sentient being is made to have confidence here.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the venerable Su­bhūti, “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: 'o na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @29b theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher rnam par ma bkod dam /
analyzed: 'o na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @29b theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher rnam par ma bkod dam /
translated: Have you not set forth extensively in this perfection of wisdom the three vehicles—the vehicle of the śrāvakas, the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, and the vehicle of the genuinely perfect buddhas?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'ang ma bstan tam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'ang ma bstan tam /
translated: Have you not revealed the acceptance of the bodhisattva great beings?

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: Have you not revealed the bodhisattva path of those who have generated the first level of mind up to those who have generated the tenth level of mind?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @30a *//
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @30a *//
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the eightfold noble path,

original: brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma bstan tam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang ma bstan tam /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba rnams kyang ma bstan tam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba rnams kyang ma bstan tam /
translated: Have the higher perceptions and the playful superhuman abilities of bodhisattva great beings not been taught?

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: So, should it not be said that bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
translated: and are born supernaturally?”

original: des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
translated: “Then why is it not said that they are not subject to regression with regard to the superknowledges?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / @30b mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / @30b mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
translated: “Why is it not said that they will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and that they will have the roots of virtue necessary to serve, honor, respect, and worship the Blessed Buddhas, and that they will have the roots of virtue necessary to bring beings to maturity and to purify a buddhafield?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //🔽zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro // zhes mi bya'am /
translated: “Why is it not said that they will never lose the Dharma that they have heard from those Blessed Buddhas until they attain omniscience?

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes mi bya'am /
translated: “Why is it not said that they will always be in meditative equipoise, in a state of non-disturbance and non-absorption?

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: It is eloquence that is unobstructed, uninterrupted, composed, logical, connected, meaningful,🔽

original: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes mi bya'am /
translated: “Is it not the case that they will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence of meditative absorption, logical eloquence, connected eloquence, meaningful eloquence, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is just so.

original: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan to //
