analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: In this perfection of wisdom, the three vehicles—the Śrāvaka Vehicle, the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle, and the Vehicle of the Perfectly Awakened One—are taught in detail.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'ang bstan /🔽sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta @31a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'ang bstan / sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta @31a *//
translated: the acceptance of the nonarising of dharmas,🔽the perfection of giving,🔽the perfection of morality,🔽the perfection of patience,

original: ste / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: ste / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of perseverance,🔽the perfection of concentration,🔽the perfection of wisdom,🔽inner emptiness,🔽outer emptiness,🔽inner and outer emptiness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness,🔽the great emptiness,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of compounded things, the emptiness of uncompounded things, the emptiness of what transcends limits, the emptiness of no beginning or end, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonthings, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: The four kinds of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of magical power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis @31b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis @31b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of correct knowledge,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He also demonstrates the superknowledges and the play of magical powers of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are miraculously born.

original: des na / mngon bar shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon bar shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they are also those whose qualities are not subject to loss with regard to the superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and the roots of virtue by which they wish to honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to those lord buddhas are also perfected.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang @32a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang @32a *//
translated: Whatever Dharma he hears from those lord buddhas, until he has attained omniscience,

original: rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: he will never forget it.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will always be in meditative equipoise, in a way that is not agitated and in a way that is not meditative equipoise.

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: He will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence that is in meditative equipoise, logical eloquence, connected eloquence, meaningful eloquence,🔽and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro; ;gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro; ;gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhe na /
translated: “What is the way of nonapprehending?”

original: bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srog mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gso ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skyes bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gang zag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽shed can mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shed bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srog mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gso ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skyes bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gang zag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shed can mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shed bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is to not apprehend a self, a being, a life force, a creature, a person, an individual,🔽a human, a human being, a human body, a human person, a man, a human doer, a human experiencer, a human knower, or a human seer.

original: gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / @32b rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / @32b rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is to not apprehend form, to not apprehend feeling, to not apprehend perception, to not apprehend formation, to not apprehend consciousness, to not apprehend the eyes,

original: rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang // mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang // mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the ear is not apprehended, the way the nose is not apprehended, the way the tongue is not apprehended, the way the body is not apprehended, the way the mind is not apprehended, the way form is not apprehended, the way sound is not apprehended,🔽the way smell is not apprehended, the way taste is not apprehended, the way texture is not apprehended, and the way mental phenomena are not apprehended, the way eye consciousness is not apprehended, the way ear consciousness is not apprehended,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way nose consciousness is not apprehended, the way tongue consciousness is not apprehended, the way body consciousness is not apprehended, the way mind consciousness is not apprehended, the way eye contact is not apprehended,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus @33a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus @33a *//
translated: the way the composite of ear contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of nose contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of tongue contact is non-apprehensible, the way the composite of body contact is non-apprehensible, and the way the composite of thought contact is non-apprehensible.

original: te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the feeling that arises from the composite of eye contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of ear contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of nose contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of tongue contact is non-apprehensible, the way the feeling that arises from the composite of body contact is non-apprehensible, and the way the feeling that arises from the composite of thought contact is non-apprehensible.

original: sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the earth element is non-apprehensible, the way the water element is non-apprehensible, the way the fire element is non-apprehensible, the way the wind element is non-apprehensible, the way the space element is non-apprehensible, and the way the consciousness element is non-apprehensible;🔽the way ignorance is non-apprehensible, the way volitional factors are non-apprehensible, the way consciousness is non-apprehensible, the way name and form are non-apprehensible, the way the six sense fields are non-apprehensible, the way contact is non-apprehensible,

original: ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way feeling is non-apprehensible, the way craving is non-apprehensible, the way appropriation is non-apprehensible, the way existence is non-apprehensible, the way birth is non-apprehensible, the way aging and death are non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of feeling, the non-apprehension of craving, the non-apprehension of appropriation, the non-apprehension of existence, the non-apprehension of birth, the non-apprehension of old age and death, the non-apprehension of the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha @33b rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha @33b rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of the perfection of conduct, the non-apprehension of the perfection of patience, the non-apprehension of the perfection of diligence, the non-apprehension of the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the perfection of wisdom, the way of nonapprehending;🔽inner emptiness, the way of nonapprehending; outer emptiness, the way of nonapprehending; inner and outer emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;🔽emptiness that is a nonempty emptiness, the way of nonapprehending;

original: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: great emptiness, the way of nonapprehending; ultimate emptiness, the way of nonapprehending; emptiness of compounded things, the way of nonapprehending; emptiness of uncompounded things, the way of nonapprehending; emptiness that is beyond extremes, the way of nonapprehending;

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness that is neither with nor without end is not apprehended,🔽the emptiness of non-rejection is not apprehended, the emptiness of a basic nature is not apprehended, the emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended,🔽the emptiness of defining characteristics is not apprehended, the emptiness of non-apprehension is not apprehended, the emptiness of non-entities is not apprehended, the emptiness of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul @34a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul @34a *//
translated: the emptiness of an essential nature of non-entities is not apprehended, and the applications of mindfulness are not apprehended.

original: dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the right efforts in a non-apprehending way, the legs of miraculous power in a non-apprehending way, the faculties in a non-apprehending way, the powers in a non-apprehending way, the branches of awakening in a non-apprehending way,

original: lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the path in a non-apprehending way, the noble truths in a non-apprehending way, the concentrations in a non-apprehending way, the immeasurables in a non-apprehending way, the formless absorptions in a non-apprehending way,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the gateways to liberation are non-apprehensible, the way the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are non-apprehensible,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the superknowledges are non-apprehensible, the way the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible, the way the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible, the way the powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible, the way the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang // byams pa chen po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs @34b pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang // byams pa chen po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs @34b pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonexistence, the emptiness of essential nature of nonexistence, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics of nonexistence, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonexistence, the emptiness of essential nature of nonexistence, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics of nonexistence, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of the past, the emptiness of the future, and the emptiness of the present.🔽the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness, the emptiness of the correct exertions, the emptiness of the supports for miraculous ability, the emptiness of the faculties, the emptiness of the powers, the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment, the emptiness of the path, the emptiness of the fruits of asceticism, the emptiness of the ten powers, the emptiness of the fearlessnesses, the emptiness of the detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of the aspects of the path, the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects, the emptiness of the knowledge of paths, and the emptiness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: Then venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, why is it that in this perfection of wisdom the three vehicles are taught in great detail by way of nonapprehending?

original: ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan /
translated: Why is it that the bodhisattva great beings are taught to be the ones who are taken hold of?

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this bodhisattva path of the bodhisattvas from the time when they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment up until the tenth level, namely,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the transcendent perfection of generosity, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of patience, the transcendent perfection of diligence, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, and the transcendent perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med @35a *//🔽pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med @35a *// pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-existence, the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence. The four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas—

original: ci'i phyir bstan /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bstan /
translated: why are they taught?

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi @35b mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi @35b mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing /
translated: Why do the bodhisattva mahāsattvas display their higher knowledge and their magical power?

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: they are reborn miraculously.

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin /🔽ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin / ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
translated: Therefore, they are endowed with the quality of never regressing from the higher knowledges.🔽Why is it that they go from buddhafield to buddhafield?

original: mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
translated: They are endowed with the roots of virtue by which they wish to honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to those lord buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad bar mi 'gyur pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad bar mi 'gyur pa yin /
translated: Whatever Dharma they hear from those Buddha Bhagavats, until they attain omniscience, that Dharma will never be interrupted.

original: ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Why is it that they will always be in meditative equipoise, in a way that is not agitated and not in meditative equipoise?

original: ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /🔽'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon @36a *//
analyzed: ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon @36a *//
translated: Why is it that those Bodhisattva Mahasattvas, by way of not apprehending anything, have unobstructed confidence, uninterrupted confidence, confidence in meditative equipoise, confidence in reasoning,

original: par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
translated: confidence in connection, confidence in meaning, and confidence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti said to him, “Lord, it is amazing how much the bodhisattva great beings have been given to do.🔽Lord, the bodhisattva great beings have been given to do a lot.”

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: “Subhūti, it is because of inner emptiness that the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of not apprehending them.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: It is because of outer emptiness that the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of not apprehending them.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: It is because of inner and outer emptiness that the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of not apprehending them.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: It is because of the emptiness of emptiness that the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of not apprehending them.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: It is because of great emptiness that the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of not apprehending them.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the ultimate, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of the compounded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension. Because of the emptiness of the uncompounded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to; ;'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to; ;'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of nature, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of all phenomena, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of specific characteristics, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of the inexpressible, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of non-things, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of inherent existence, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of other-existence, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of non-existence, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of inherent existence and non-existence, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of the conditioned, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the unconditioned, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of the ultimate, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of the compounded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension. Because of the emptiness of the uncompounded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir @36b mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir @36b mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded, the three vehicles are extensively taught by way of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of nature

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because all dharmas are empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because specific characteristics are empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.🔽Because non-apprehension is empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because non-things are empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.🔽Because intrinsic natures are empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: Because the intrinsic nature of non-things is empty, the three vehicles are extensively taught in a way that is not apprehended.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: For the sake of inner emptiness, the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings is revealed.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva path from the first production of the thought up to the tenth-stage production of the thought is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / @37a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / @37a *//
translated: the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginningless and endless phenomena,🔽the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of the nonexistence of things,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge, all the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi @37b dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi @37b dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of intrepid confidence, the four kinds of precise knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He also demonstrates the superknowledges and the play of magical powers of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are born supernaturally.

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they also become those whose qualities do not decline in the superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They also perfect the roots of virtue that they wish to use to honor, venerate, respect, and worship those buddha bhagavāns in the buddha fields that they wish to go to.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever Dharma they hear from those Buddha Bhagavats, until they attain omniscience, they will never forget it.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will always be in meditation, in a way that is not agitated and not concentrated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i @38a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i @38a *//
translated: Those bodhisattva mahāsattvas will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence that is

original: spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing /🔽khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing /🔽khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: in equipoise, logical eloquence, connected eloquence, meaningful eloquence, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: For the sake of the emptiness of the external, the bodhisattva great beings have been taken hold of.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva path from the first production of the thought up to the tenth production of the thought is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo @38b bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo @38b bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi dmigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi dmigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of correct understanding,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: the four forms of fearlessness, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtsa ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtsa ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He also taught the superknowledges and the miraculous abilities of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams /
analyzed: des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: is said to be born supernaturally.

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing @39a *//
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi zhing @39a *//
translated: And they will not fall away from the superknowledges.🔽They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield,

original: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will perfect the roots of virtue by which they will honor, revere, respect, and worship the lord buddhas with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands,🔽unguents, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with every kind of human pleasure.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will not forget those dharmas that they have heard from those lord buddhas until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: and they are always in meditative concentration, in the sense that they are without distraction and without meditative equipoise.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything, have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, meditative concentration eloquence, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: and they have eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all the worlds.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba bstan to //
translated: The teaching of the thorough apprehending of the bodhisattva great beings is revealed by the emptiness of the inner, the emptiness of the outer, and the emptiness of the inner and outer.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas /
translated: From the first production of the thought

original: sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: up to the tenth-stage thought, the bodhisattva path is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @39b phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @39b phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration,🔽the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of nonrejection, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-existence, the emptiness of own-nature, the emptiness of the own-being of non-existence,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four applications of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon @40a *//🔽pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan to /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon @40a *// pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan to /
translated: the five higher knowledges, all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽the fourfold fearlessness, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽He taught the higher knowledges and the magical manifestations of the bodhisattva great beings.🔽
