original: mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not fall away from their superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and they will perfect the roots of goodness by which they will honor the lord buddhas, and by which they will serve them, honor them, and worship them.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never forget those teachings that they have heard from those lord buddhas until they attain the knowledge of an omniscient one.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will always be in meditation, in a way that is not agitated and in a way that is not absorbed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything, will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence of meditative stabilization, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: eloquence endowed with meaning, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: Because all phenomena are empty, the thorough grasping of the bodhisattva great beings is taught.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa @52b nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa @52b nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva path of those who have produced the first thought of awakening up to those who have produced the tenth thought of awakening is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa @53a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa @53a *//
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations,🔽the nine serial absorptions,

original: brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the five kinds of clairvoyance, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He also taught the higher cognitions and the playful displays of magical emanations of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom and are born supernaturally.

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: They also have the quality of not falling away from the superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and the roots of virtue by which they wish to honor, venerate, respect, and worship those lord buddhas are also perfected.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam @53b pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam @53b pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Dharma that they hear from those lord buddhas is never lost until they attain the knowledge of an omniscient one.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are always in meditative concentration, in the sense that they are without disturbance and without distraction.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, meditative concentration eloquence, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and meaningful eloquence. They have eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: The teaching of the bodhisattva great beings’ perfect acceptance is due to the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva path of those who have generated the first thought of awakening up to the tenth thought of awakening is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid @54a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid @54a *//
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽There are the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the four formless meditative absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the three gateways to complete liberation,🔽

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the emptiness aspect of the absence of expectancy, the absence of expectancy that is the emptiness aspect, the absence of expectancy that is the absence of attributes, the absence of attributes that is the absence of expectancy, the absence of attributes that is the absence of aspiration, the absence of aspiration that is the absence of attributes, the absence of aspiration that is the absence of attributes, the absence of attributes that is the absence of aspiration, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: @54b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: @54b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He revealed the superknowledges and the playful manifestations of magical abilities of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //🔽des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o // des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom and are born supernaturally.

original: bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not fall away from the superknowledges, and they will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and whatever wholesome roots the lord buddhas have dedicated to the attentions of the lord buddhas, they will perfect those wholesome roots.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever Dharma they hear from those lord buddhas, until they reach the knowledge of all aspects, that Dharma will not disappear.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: they are always in meditative concentration, in the sense that they are without disturbance and without distraction.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, meditative concentration eloquence, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad @55a *//🔽las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad @55a *// las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: eloquence that is meaningful, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: The teaching of the bodhisattva great beings is revealed because of the emptiness of nonapprehending.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva path of those bodhisattva great beings from the first production of the thought up to the tenth-level production of the thought is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga @55b dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga @55b dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they will not fall away from the superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur @56a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur @56a *//
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and the wholesome roots by which they will honor the lord buddhas,

original: stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will respect, revere, and worship them, those wholesome roots will be perfected.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Dharma that they will hear from those lord buddhas will never be lost until they attain the knowledge of an omniscient one.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will always be in meditation, in a way that is not agitated and in a way that is not absorbed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything, have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence of meditative stabilization, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,🔽eloquence endowed with meaning, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.🔽For the sake of the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of giving and the perfection of morality are included.🔽For the sake of the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of wisdom is included.

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: For the sake of the perfection of wisdom, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are included.🔽For the sake of the perfection of wisdom, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are included.🔽For the sake of the perfection of wisdom, the knowledge of all aspects is included.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /

original: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @56b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @56b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stang pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stang pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi dang /

translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they will not fall away from their superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and the roots of goodness by which they will honor the lord buddhas, and pay homage to them, respect them, and make offerings to them, will be perfected.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro; ;'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro; ;'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Dharma that they hear from those lord buddhas will never be lost until they attain the knowledge of an omniscient one, and they will always be in meditation, in a state of non-disturbance and non-confusion.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi @57b dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi @57b dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings, by way of not apprehending anything, will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence of meditative stabilization, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: eloquence that is meaningful, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of essential nature, the acceptance of the nonproduction of dharmas is taught.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings’ path, from the first production of the thought up to the tenth-level production of the thought, is this: the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of effort, the perfection of meditation, the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,🔽emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, emptiness of the unlimited, emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa @58a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa @58a *//
translated: emptiness of non-discarded phenomena, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, emptiness of non-apprehension, and emptiness of essential nature.

original: nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /🔽stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical emanation, the five faculties,🔽the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation, the five clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /
translated: He also taught the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
translated: He also taught the higher knowledges and the magical manifestations of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‘the bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom and are born supernaturally.’

original: des na / mngon par shes @58b pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / mngon par shes @58b pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they also become those who do not regress from the higher knowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and whatever roots of virtue they will dedicate to the enlightenment of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, they will be complete.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever Dharma they will hear from those lord buddhas, until they attain the knowledge of all aspects, that Dharma will never be forgotten.

original: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will always be in meditative equipoise, in a way that is not agitated and in a way that is not concentrated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i stobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i stobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings will have unimpeded eloquence, uninterrupted eloquence, eloquence that is settled in equipoise, logical eloquence, connected eloquence,

original: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: eloquence that is meaningful, and eloquence that is exalted and distinguished above all worlds.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to //
translated: The teaching of the bodhisattva great beings’ perfect acceptance is due to the emptiness of essential nature that is the absence of an entity.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings’ path, from the first production of the thought up to the tenth production of the thought, is as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i @59a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i @59a *//
translated: generosity,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis @59b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis @59b gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /🔽byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te /

original: des na; mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na; mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not fall away from the superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, and they will perfect the roots of goodness by which they will honor the lord buddhas, and by which they will serve them, honor them, and worship them.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad @60a *//🔽par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad @60a *// par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will never forget those dharmas, until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'phrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will always be in meditative equipoise, without being distracted, without being without distraction, without being in meditative equipoise, without not being in meditative equipoise.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
